Advisory.Description: libxml2 20904-GITv2.9.4-16-g0741801 is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer over-read in the xmlDictAddString function in dict.c. This vulnerability causes programs that use libxml2, such as PHP, to crash. This vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2016-1839.  GitHub is notifying on nokogiri as uses libxml2.
Advisory.Summary: Critical severity vulnerability that affects nokogiri
